tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE early_childhood_education_resources (
  resource_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  resource_name VARCHAR(255),
  resource_type VARCHAR(50),
  resource_description TEXT,
  resource_quantity INT
)

CREATE TABLE early_childhood_education_materials (
  material_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  material_name VARCHAR(255),
  material_type VARCHAR(50),
  material_description TEXT,
  material_price DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE teacher_resources (
  resource_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  resource_name VARCHAR(255),
  resource_type VARCHAR(50),
  resource_description TEXT,
  resource_link VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE teacher_material_inventory (
  inventory_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  teacher_id INT,
  material_id INT,
  quantity INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (teacher_id) REFERENCES teachers(teacher_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (material_id) REFERENCES early_childhood_education_materials(material_id)
)

CREATE TABLE teachers (
  teacher_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  teacher_name VARCHAR(100),
  teacher_email VARCHAR(100),
  teacher_phone VARCHAR(15)
)

CREATE TABLE material_reviews (
  review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  material_id INT,
  teacher_id INT,
  review_stars INT,
  review_comment TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (material_id) REFERENCES early_childhood_education_materials(material_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (teacher_id) REFERENCES teachers(teacher_id)
)
